;Natural pellets also let your African Grey avoid the superior quantities of sugar in colored pellets. Most African Grey parrot owners treatment enough about the bird in which they've invested so significantly money, that they don't want to give it a eating plan that is higher in sugar.

;African Grey parrots' food that is based mostly on natural and organic pellets will be absolutely free of contaminants that may possibly be uncovered in other pellets. In the U.S., federal government laws force companies earning organic and natural parrot food not to use pesticides or other contaminants.

;In addition to a basic, formulated pellet meals, African Greys need several of the very same meals you try to eat.

;one. Fresh veggies: Offer you your African Grey a large wide range of greens, raw or cooked. Assume bright, deep colours for the most diet. ;three. Other supplemental food items: African Grey parrots appreciate cooked eggs and compact amounts of yogurt now and then. ;Water, Please
;

;Handy Tip
